name: hotwired
short_description: hotwired is a Hotline server for Unix-like operating systems.  It aims to implement all the features of the level 2 Hotline protocol (i.e. Hotline > 1.5), including transfer queues, threaded news, and user management.

license.fullpath: License :: OSI-Approved Open Source :: BSD License
